value: * This do file constructs the agricultural commodities shock used in Berman and Couttenier (2014), based on FAO-GAEZ data     *
* A - NETTOYAGE DATA GAEZ + ADD SHOCKS *

/*
The five categories and their corresponding yields are: 
(i) very suitable land (80100 percent),
(ii) suitable land (6080 percent), 
(iii) moderately suitable land (4060 percent), 
(iv)marginally suitable land(2040 percent), 
and (v) unsuitable land(020 percent).
*/
* C - MERGE WITH WORLD DEMAND FOR HS COMMODITY AND FINISH *

varlist.value: "World demand weighted by hs spec., Suitability 40(Gaez)"
